response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value for us, and we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth to both parties, we propose a price of $1,300,000 for this transaction. We understand that the product is valued at $1,200,000 to you, and we aim to find a mutually beneficial agreement. Should you accept this offer, please let us know, and we will proceed with the necessary arrangements. If you need more information or have any questions, feel free to reach out to me directly. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1300000}
